context: Created TOAST UI Editor tutorial artifact, discovered Parcel bundling issues with complex content, successfully used Vite as primary bundling method
reproducible_prompt: Create an ARTIFACT TUTORIAL of the Toast UI https://ui.toast.com/tui-editor. I want to go through real code examples, including advanced features, as well as integration with React.

building-artifacts.notes: Init script worked perfectly. Parcel bundling failed with complex content. Vite fallback method succeeded. Should make Vite the primary method.

documentation-tutorial.notes: Principles worked excellently for structuring tutorial with code examples, tabs, mental models, and real scenarios. Code-first approach was perfect fit.

issues_encountered: Parcel bundling failed with 'Unterminated string literal' error
TypeScript errors (unused imports, type assertions needed)
solutions_applied: Added proper build configuration with inlineDynamicImports
